item.title: fix(bug 57535)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 57535) - Add POI-specific error codes to FormulaError

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI Developers - Start on common interfaces for Paragraphs and Character Runs for HWPF and XWPF

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI Developers - Double Strikethrough support for XWPF runs, along the lines of the HWPF support

item.title: fix(bug 57482)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 57482) - Handle XSSF .xlsx files with no shared strings table in read-only mode

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI Developers - ExtractorFactory opening of OPCPackage from File should be read-only by default, as text extracting will never change things

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI Developers - XSSFSheet support for getDrawingPatriarch(), alongside the existing createDrawingPatriarch() method

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI Developers - TIKA-1515 - Handle Excel 3 files with a 0x8001 codepage

item.title: add(bug 53453)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 53453) - Add methods to set margins in sections of HWPF documents

item.title: fix(bug 46898)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 46898) - XSSF: Return #VALUE! for circular references.

item.title: fix(bug 46192)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 46192) - Add methods to query outline level for HSSF and XSSF

item.title: fix(bug 56240)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 56240) - Handle PP97_DUALSTORAGE streams

item.title: fix(bug 47261)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 47261) - SlideShow.removeSlide makes PPT corrupted

item.title: add(bug 49541)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 49541) - Mapping of symbol characters to unicode equivalent

item.title: add(bug 54541)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 54541) - Add support for cropped images in Slide.draw()

item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 57007) - Add initial implementations of DMIN and DGET functions

item.title: add

item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 57195) - Support for Office Binary Document RC4 Encryption

item.title: fix(bug 57373)

item.title: fix(bug 57362)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 57362) - Properly initialize chart-axis datastructure when loading a spreadsheet which already contains one.

item.title: fix(bug 56511)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 56511) - Fix NullPointerException for RichText strings with no formatting for some runs.

item.title: add(bug 56550)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 56550) - Avoid IBM JDK fail immediately during loading some POI classes, note: IBM JDK 1.7 or higher is needed because of XML APIs.

item.title: add(bug 56595)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 56595) - Switch the cache in DateUtil.isADateFormat() to ThreadLocals to not have another syncpoint here.

item.title: fix(bug 56644)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 56644) - NullPointerException in XSSFCell Constructor with different MissingCellPolicy

item.title: fix(bug 56888)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 56888) - XSSFDataValidation ignores "allow blank" read from sheet, assumes true

item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 57171) - Adjust the active sheet in setSheetOrder()

item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 57163) - Adjust the active sheet in removeSheet()

item.title: fix(bug 57231)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 57231) - Add missing ArrayRecord.clone()

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI Developers - Expose the version information from OldExcelExtractor
